item.title: How to program the "TV-part" of a Yamaha V465 receiver remote
item.description:
When I got my brothers old TV a little while back we were using the remote for the TV-decoder to turn the TV on and off. Since we now longer have a TV-decoder I need to program the AV-receiver remote instead. The Yamaha RX-V465 AV-receiver have buttons to control the TV at the bottom, but no information about how to program them in the manual. After a bit of googling I found the answer on avsforum.com.

  1. Press theÂ CODE SET
  2. Then choose [A] or [b] from the Input selection keys
  3. Enter the code for your TV

If everything worked out the Transmit light should blink twice.
